resources.string: Affirmations
I am Strong
I believe in myself.
Each day is a new opportunity to grow and be a better version of myself.
Every challenge in my life is an opportunity to learn from.
I have so much to be grateful for.
Good things are always coming into my life.
New opportunities await me at every turn.
I have the courage to follow my heart.
Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
I will be present in all the moments that this day brings.
I am Woman..Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.
I am fearless.I am love. I am purpose. I was made with divine intention
I am amazing at what i do.I am worthy of what I desire.
I am adventurous. I overcome fears by following my dreams.
I feed my spirit. I train my body. I focus my mind. Itâ€™s my time.
I am the hero of my own life.
I am in charge of my own life
I can speak my mind.I have the power to create change.
I am beautiful. I am worthy. I am loved. I am enough.
I deserve good things. I am resilient and can get through anything.
